channel.title: LCA on Blog of Kai
channel.description: Recent content in LCA on Blog of Kai

item.title: Waste is not a service
item.description: https://link.springer.com/content/pdf/10.1007/s11367-021-01955-5.pdf Almost every overview of LCA gives a graphical indication of the idea of a life cycle.

item.title: Spatially-explicit footprints of agricultural commodities Mapping carbon emissions embodied in Brazil's soy exports
item.description: Abstract LCA faces limitations when it comes to addressing spatial and temporal variability in production, transportation and manufacturing systems.

item.title: Global Scenarios of Resource and Emissions Savings from systemic Material Efficiency in Buildings and Cars
item.description: Abstract Here we present a high-resolution approach for tracking material flows and energy use of products throughout their life cycles, focusing on passenger vehicles and residential buildings.
